Posts.Content: I have an ovoid mass in my right breast, I have density, but that could be a skin fold and I have calcifications in my left breast. I am going in on Monday. She also said that she had ordered an ultrasound if needed.
Posts.Title: Talked to Dr.'s office this is what she said: is it bad?

Posts.Content:
I went in for my first mammo. I am 40. The breast I had no concerns about
 got a "call back: for a diagnostic Mammo.Â  They say there are "two areas of concern", that they have nothing to go back to, because this is my first. She tells me, it could just be a skin fold, but I keep thinking in 2 areas, really what are the odds of that.
Posts.Title: Trying Hard to go completely over the top.

Posts.Content: I am wishing the best of luck for you. I go for my 2nd Mammogram on Monday. Monday will be a big day for us.
Posts.Title: cluster of 20 microcalcifications
